title: Q & A December 2019:  Music (Modern, Rap, Christian), Art, Commercial Culture, Time, Folk Matrix
description:
Here is the Q & A for December 2019. Excellent questions all round. I attempt to give some answers. Some topics were much too large, nevertheless I gave it 'the old college try' (whatever that means). I also spend a while with one of my signature ideas the Folk Matrix Pyramid, Which doesn't mean I'm talking about folk music much. Rather it has to do with the connection of art traditionally to daily life. We'll do this again in January. Thanks for asking and listening to this. 

Mediated / Unmediated Lecture - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hj76WwkerTQ
Texture Lecture - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xUNKcU_4LP8
Noise Enters Music Lecture - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KksRBCx5j6w


YOU CAN SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL. Please consider a monthly contribution through PayPal to receive extra content and to help me from financially crashing here in Georgia. And if you start today you can get 7 hours worth of extra content immediately. 
Click this...  https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RGG

Watch this video for more about our extra content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nykTp3TziRY

My other YouTube channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas: https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 
The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 
And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. Swim against the stream my friends. 

From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Byrne

#music  #time  #history
